data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 7,939 believers in Shiga against self-centered spirituality. Open their eyes to the fields ripe for harvest around them.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Shiga, Japan

data.prayer: Father, thank you that in your kindness you have made every believer in Shiga, Japan a priest, who can offer spiritual sacrifices to you through Jesus.
data.verse: Therefore I tell you that the kingdom of God will be taken away from you and given to a people who will produce its fruit. He who falls on this stone will be broken to pieces, but he on whom it falls will be crushed.”

data.section_summary: On average, 165 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Shiga, Japan.
data.prayer: Lord, send your gospel to these.
Spirit, guide someone in the church in the state of Shiga to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Shiga, Japan to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Lord we pray you unite the 7,939 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Shiga.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.prayer: Jesus, defend your people in the state of Shiga against the difficulty of these last days.
data.verse: But mark this: There will be terrible times in the last days. 2 People will be lovers of themselves, lovers of money, boastful, proud, abusive, disobedient to their parents, ungrateful, unholy, 3 without love, unforgiving, slanderous, without self-control, brutal, not lovers of the good, 4 treacherous, rash, conceited, lovers of pleasure rather than lovers of God— 5 having a form of godliness but denying its power.

data.prayer: Lord, please give apostles to expand the church into every neighborhood of Shiga, Japan.
data.verse: Therefore go and make disciples of all nations, baptizing them in the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit, and teaching them to obey everything I have commanded you.
